title: Looking for a Howe McCormick stamped HOFer with a Piedmont 350-460 back
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Looking for a Howe McCormick stamped HOFer with a Piedmont 350-460 back
posts.post_content:
Need one of these for my HOF back run if anyone has one they could part with.  Ideally hoping for GD-VG ish condition.  Can buy or trade.

Thanks for looking!
